## Setting Up Training/Testing Split
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)

df <- fread("Stat_380_housedata.csv")
pattern <- "test"

test <-
  df %>%
  filter(str_detect(Id, pattern = pattern))


train <-
  df %>%
  filter(str_detect(Id, pattern = "train"))
```
